message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its unique value proposition, I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,200,000.  I believe this reflects the true worth of what's being offered.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to negotiate a better price. Considering the product's worth to you is $1,000,000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm proposing a price of $1,000,000.
